text: (yuddhaya sambandha va) suratayak (paricchedayak) pahala karanu læbiya yutu nove dæ?yi visvasa kalavun vimasati. namut tiranatmaka suratayak pahala karanu læba ehi yuddhaya sambandha va sandahan karanu læbu vita tama hadavat tula roga ættavun maranaya taman veta vela gat keneku sihi nætivi balannak men numba veta ovuhu balati. eheyin ovunata (vinasaya) vadat yogyaya
